Name: Mango Collins
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.
Review: Lemon juice and gin combine with mango in this refreshing tall drink.
History: For the full story behind the origins of the Collins and its many variations see our Collins page .
Nutrition: One serving of Mango Collins contains 172 calories
